name: Design Conferences
body:
## 2015
### Hybrid Conf - [http://hybridconf.net/](http://hybridconf.net/)
* Dublin
* 20th - 21st August
* £299 excl. VAT

### Up Front - [http://upfrontconf.com/](http://upfrontconf.com/)
* Manchester
* 19th May
* £114 incl. VAT

### Beyond Tellerrand - [http://beyondtellerrand.com/](http://beyondtellerrand.com/)
* Berlin
* 2nd - 4th Novemeber
* £TBA

## Unannounced
### Fronteers Conference - [https://fronteers.nl/congres](https://fronteers.nl/congres)
* Amsterdam
* TBA
* £TBA
